title: A gamer’s delight! 1-month of Xbox Game Pass Ultimate is now under $10
content:
Macworld

Xbox has a wide range of games that speak to many gaming enthusiasts. If you find yourself or someone in your life curious about how to explore this console more, check out this deal that’s rated an average of 5/5 stars by verified purchasers.

Ahead of Black Friday, you can get a one-month subscription for Xbox Game Pass Ultimate on sale for just $9.97 (reg. $29). The price is so right that you could grab one for yourself and a loved one!

This subscription provides access to over 100 games you can play with friends via your Xbox, and even your PC, phone, or tablet. An EA Play membership is also included with no additional fees, offering gamers EA’s top-rated series titles, exclusive in-game challenges and rewards, members-only content, and exclusive trials of select games for up to 10 hours.â€‹

You’ll also get Xbox Live Gold, a community of gamers worldwide who enjoy free new games monthly and discounts of up to 50% at the Xbox store. Xbox Cloud Gaming is another feature users can enjoy.

Enjoy pre-Black Friday savings when you get a 1-month subscription for Xbox Game Pass Ultimate for just $9.97 (reg. $29) for a limited time.

 

Xbox Game Pass Ultimate: 1-Month Subscription – $9.97
